information_transfer.response_format: When continuing the conversation, response must be in the form <agent id>: <agent response content>. When ending the conversation, respond with the string END OF CONVERSATION

problem_solving.topic: The agents need to solve a murder case together. They each possess some pieces of relevant information. Each agent should disclose what they know and use the available information to make strictly logical deductions towards solving the case. The information given is enough to solve the case and agents must not make additional assumptions. Keep each utterance short and succinct. The conversation ends if all agents have agreed on a final suspect. Otherwise, the agents will continue the conversation.
problem_solving.response_format: When continuing the conversation, response must be in the form <agent id>: <agent response content>. When ending the conversation, respond with the string END OF CONVERSATION

agents.background: Agent1 knows that the suspects are Andy, Bob, Charlie, David.
Agent2 knows that exactly 2 of the suspects always lie, the other 2 suspects never lie.
Agent3 knows that Andy said Bob is the murderer.
Agent4 knows that Bob said Charlie is the murderer.
Agent5 knows that David said Charlie is the murderer.
Agent6 knows that Charlie said at least one of Bob or David is a liar.
Agent7 knows that Charlie said David is innocent.

decision_making1.topic: The agents need to plan a trip together. They each have a set of personal preferences and requirements for this trip. Each agent should share their preferences and requirements, listen to the preferences and requirements of others, and decide as a group on a single destination for the trip. Each agent may decide not to go on the trip if the proposed destination does not appeal to them. The conversation ends if ALL agents have agreed on a final destination, even if they decide not to go. Otherwise, the agents will continue the conversation. Keep each utterance short and succinct.
decision_making1.response_format: When continuing the conversation, response must be in the form <agent id>: <agent response content>. When ending the conversation, respond with the string END OF CONVERSATION
evaluation_prompts: Where is your group going for the trip?
Have you decided to go with them?
